description: Acquisition of F Style safety barriers
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
**Title:**
W355B-234695-2 - Fencing
**Reference Number:** WS4318505792-Doc4599581349
**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the supply of F-style safety barriers.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-06-13T14:00:00
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-22
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Requirements

The tender requires the supply of:

* 40 F-style safety barriers
* 10 F-style safety barriers with fence

The tender is for a period starting from 2024-07-03, subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the annex.

## Eligibility and Solicitation Method

* Goods and Services Category: Fencing
* UNSPSC Code: 30152000
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Solicitation Language: English and French

## Contact Information

* Felix-Antoine Carignan, PSPC/SPAC (he/him)
* Email: felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787213?extsite=MTk3ODcyMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Confirmation Notice

Notice URL (English): https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787213?extsite=MTk3ODcyMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Confirmation Notice
Notice URL (French): https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787213?extsite=MTk3ODcyMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Confirmation Notice

## Submission and Evaluation

All submissions must be made through the online portal. Proposals must be received by the deadline. Evaluations will be based on the lowest price.

Please address any inquiries to the contact person, Felix-Antoine Carignan. This notice will remain on this website until Closing Date. No communication after Closing Date will be accepted
